name: Environaut\Report\Results\Result
short_desc: Result that checks provide for a report.

addMessage.name: addMessage
addMessage.short_desc: Adds the given message to the internal list of messages.
addMessage.hint_desc: this instance for fluent API support

addSetting.name: addSetting
addSetting.short_desc: Adds the given setting to the internal lists of settings.
addSetting.hint_desc: this instance for fluent API support

setting.name: setting
setting.short_desc: setting to add to internal lists of settings

cachable.name: cachable
cachable.short_desc: whether or not the setting may be put into a cache for reuse on re-execution of the check

addSettings.name: addSettings
addSettings.short_desc: Adds the given setting to the internal list of settings.
addSettings.hint_desc: this instance for fluent API support

settings.name: settings
settings.short_desc: array with ISetting implementing instances to add

cachable.name: cachable
cachable.short_desc: whether or not the setting may be put into a cache for reuse on re-execution of the check

setMessages.name: setMessages
setMessages.short_desc: Replaces the internal list of messages with the given list.
setMessages.hint_desc: this instance for fluent API support

getMessages.name: getMessages
getMessages.short_desc: Returns the internal list of messages emitted by the processed check.

getSettings.name: getSettings
getSettings.short_desc: Returns the internal list of settings emitted by the processed check.
getSettings.hint_desc: of ISetting implementing instances matching the arguments

groups.name: groups
groups.short_desc: group names of settings to return

flag.name: flag
flag.short_desc: flag value the settings should belong to

getCachableSettings.name: getCachableSettings
getCachableSettings.short_desc: Returns the internal list of cachable settings emitted by the processed check.
getCachableSettings.hint_desc: of ISetting implementing instances matching the arguments

groups.name: groups
groups.short_desc: group names of settings to return

flag.name: flag
flag.short_desc: flag value the settings should belong to

getSettingsAsArray.name: getSettingsAsArray
getSettingsAsArray.short_desc: Return all settings or the settings of the specified groups as an array.
getSettingsAsArray.hint_desc: all settings (for the specified groups); empty array if groups don't exist.

groups.name: groups
groups.short_desc: group names of settings to return

flag.name: flag
flag.short_desc: flag value the settings should belong to

getCachableSettingsAsArray.name: getCachableSettingsAsArray
getCachableSettingsAsArray.short_desc: Return all cachable settings or the cachable settings of the specified groups as an array.
getCachableSettingsAsArray.hint_desc: all cachable settings (for the specified groups); empty array if groups don't exist.

groups.name: groups
groups.short_desc: group names of cachable settings to return

flag.name: flag
flag.short_desc: flag value the settings should belong to

setStatus.name: setStatus
setStatus.short_desc: Sets the status of the current result (which may be of interest for the later export and cache writing).
setStatus.hint_desc: this instance for fluent API support

status.name: status
status.short_desc: one of the constants from IResult (like IResult::SUCCESS or IResult::FAIL)

getStatus.name: getStatus
getStatus.short_desc: Returns the current status of this result (usually one of the IResult::SUCCESS or IResult::FAIL constants).

setCheck.name: setCheck
setCheck.short_desc: Sets the check instance this result belongs to.
setCheck.hint_desc: this instance for fluent API support

getCheck.name: getCheck
getCheck.short_desc: Returns the check instance this result belongs to.
getCheck.hint_desc: check instance this result belongs to
